code: import{ALERT}from"../../constants";import axios from"@helpers/axios/private.axios";export const changeUserNumber=_ref=>{let{old_password,password,confirm_password}=_ref;return async dispatch=>{const resp=await axios.post("/users/change/password",{old_password,password,confirm_password});const{message}=resp.data;dispatch({type:ALERT.ALERT_SUCCESS,payload:message});return resp.data;};};
